Detailed Description

Definition at line 22 of file TrayIcon.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

TrayIcon::TrayIcon (  const HWND  hWnd,
const unsigned int  callbackMessage
) 
 

Constructor.

Creates a tray icon for window hWnd. Notifications are sent to the window using callbackMessage.

Parameters:
hWnd handle to parent window
callbackMessage windows message to send on notification.

Definition at line 22 of file TrayIcon.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

void TrayIcon::setIcon (  const HICON  hIcon  ) 
 

Set a new icon.

Also adds the icon to the tray on first call or after a call to remove has been made.

Parameters:
hIcon handle to new icon

void TrayIcon::setInfo (  const char *  message,
const char *  title = "",
const unsigned int  timeout = 10000,
const long  icon = NIIF_NONE
) 
 

Show a balloon help message.

Parameters:
message the message to show
title title of the dialog.
timeout timeout in milliseconds. Should be between 10000 and 30000
icon the icon to show in the dialog.

void TrayIcon::setToolTip (  const char *  toolTip  ) 
 

Set the tool tip of the tray icon.

To show a balloon tip, use setInfo()

Parameters:
toolTip tool tip of notification icon
